name: Paranoia (itch) (Midnight Link Entertainment)
description:
Paranoia is a 3D first-person game, set in the 1950s, inspired by the film "Rear Window". You will control Jefferies, a former war photographer. His wife was murdered in the neighborhood, the police have not yet found the murderer and he may still be in the neighborhood. 

Investigate the neighborhood, observe people, break into residences, and look for the murder weapon to report it over the phone in your own house and prove who murdered your wife!

Procedural: Each time you play it will be a different killer and a different weapon. 

This game is a prototype, may contain bugs.

PC keybinds:

  • W/A/S/D - Movement
  • Shift - Sprint
  • E - Interactions
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Mouse Scroll - Zoom In / Zoom Out
